subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd proved again why he is one of the N.B.A.’s most versatile guards, making a key defensive stop and just missing a triple-double Wednesday night to help the Nets overcome a 15-point deficit and beat the Magic, 96-95, in Orlando, Fla.
snippet: Jason Kidd proved again why he is one of the N.B.A.’s most versatile guards, making a key defensive stop and just missing a triple-double Wednesday night to help the Nets overcome a 15-point deficit and beat the Magic, 96-95, in Orlando, Fla.
